answers.question: Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.

answers.answer: Trusted by EF, Optimism, Polygon, and Mantle, CharmVerse is a grants management and community platform designed for onchain communities. Designed for onchain/offchain collaboration, CharmVerse provides highly configurable review and voting steps adapted to voters and grants councils' specific processes. Streamlined application and communication features keep the community informed. The platform includes token-based role assignments, decentralized credentials, and milestone-based tracking and payments.
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.

answers.answer:
CharmVerse stands out in terms of its superior user experience and flexibility. It is unique in its ability to configure the platform to address the exact needs of the grants council and other onchain communities.

- Submission form: step-by-step guide for applicants with fully customizable templates

- Adapt to your workflow: configure evaluation steps that map to your process. (e.g., Initial Review, Shortlist, Final Review, Milestone Tracking)

- Integrated communication: one place for community members and council members to view, comment, and suggest changes to grant applications
- Customizable transparency: different roles get different access: publicly viewable, comment only, review/evaluation, & vote

- Know the applicants: member profiles that auto-populate with applicants’ ENS, Lens, and other identities. Generate decentralized credentials for successful grant applications and milestone completions.

- Milestone tracking & payments

- Notifications: Applicants receive in-app and email notifications for key status changes and feedback from the grants council.

- Essential grants integrations, including Docusign, Synaps, Persona, Snapshot, Safe, Ethereum Attestation Service and more
answers.question: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?

answers.answer: We build with our community. We continue to add features that benefit our community's immediate needs. In the near term, our focus will be on additional integration that makes working with CharmVerse and other platforms easier.
answers.question: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]—for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.
